text: @GOPChairwoman @realDonaldTrump Uh, we're witnessing the Great American Comeback - of Coronavirus (Trump Flu). And it's going to crush the economy, increase mortgage defaults and put way more than 2.5M more out of work. And only treason-enabling, Constitution-trampling morons will stand with the Orange Clown.
